message: I've been quite happy with Verizon with my Droid Incredible
But the minute Apple puts out a Verizon phone...
Ruining it for the rest of us :(

Man, I searched high and low for a section I could copy out of this and tweet with a quip, but they've worded it in such a way that no single tweetable section exists. http://support.vzw.com/terms/network_optimization.html

Sprint has been doing throttling for awhile. They do a PowerBoost(tm) type thing, will your first sips are super fast, then they throttle it back. Thankfully if you root your Android phone, you can easily bypass their proxy
@ericflo perhaps that's going to become a new writing skill... writing things in such a way that they're not easily quotable on twitter
